headline: American Tower Tests Tenant Resilience As DISH Defaults And Finance Team Shifts
summary: American Tower (NYSE:AMT) has filed a legal complaint after DISH Wireless defaulted on payment obligations under a major mutual collocation agreement. The company is seeking a declaratory judgment to enforce the agreement and clarify ongoing obligations under the tower lease arrangement. American Tower has also appointed Paul Blanchett as its new Chief Accounting Officer, bringing experience from large, multinational companies. American Tower, one of the largest independent owners of...
